attributes.action: BSDHT want HEE to financially support the training of dental hygiene/therapy
attributes.background: In line with the bursary consultation it would appear that dental hygienist and therapy training may lose their HEE funding to educate an essential health professional.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
